faq1.question: What is the goal of the crypto communities that we offer?
faq1.answer: Our goal is to be honest and open, whilst also remaining realistic. The general thought that one can only win in the crypto market is false.

faq2.question: Which platform(s) do we use for our communities?

faq3.question: Will I be granted access to exclusive information and opportunities?
faq3.answer: Yes, if you have subscribed to our VIP service you will gain access to exclusive information and opportunities.

faq4.question: What should I do if I notice suspicious activity?
faq4.answer: Please report any suspicious activity to the Crypto Architect Team by mailing your report to: Mrbtabusiness@gmail.com.

faq5.question: Do you only offer the chance to trade, or are there also educational sections?
faq5.answer: Yes, besides trading, there are also numerous educational sections where we hold various activities such as live sessions, video analysis, and fundamental analysis.

faq6.question: Am I allowed to promote my own cryptocurrency?
faq6.answer: No, you are not allowed to promote your own cryptocurrency nor someone elseâ€™s cryptocurrency.

faq7.question: Is it mandatory to engage in community activities or could I just observe these activities instead?
faq7.answer: No, engaging in community activities is not mandatory, however it is encouraged.

faq8.question: Can I become more knowledgeable in all things cryptocurrency by subscribing to the VIP service?
faq8.answer: Yes, by subscribing to our VIP service you will gain access to valuable information and analysis from recent years, allowing you to learn from both successful and unsuccessful situations. Additionally, our crypto chat offers the opportunity to follow the conversations between experienced investors and traders.

faq9.question: Do I already need to be in possession of cryptocurrency in order to subscribe to the VIP service?
faq9.answer: No, you do not need to own any cryptocurrency in order to subscribe to the VIP service.

faq10.question: When did Crypto Architect start trading cryptocurrency?
faq10.answer: We started trading in cryptocurrency back in the summer of 2019.

faq11.question: When were your crypto communities formed?
faq11.answer: Our crypto communities were formed on 31 August 2022.

faq12.question: Is Crypto Architect an investor or a trader?
faq12.answer: We are both an investor and a trader.

faq13.question: Why choose Crypto Architect?
faq13.answer: Choosing Crypto Architect means choosing reality. We actually show you what crypto stands for, without the illusion of getting rich quick. Moreover, we show how we trade live and share the results.

faq14.question: Where can I submit complaints about one of these crypto communities?
faq14.answer: We are very sorry that something was not satisfactory. You can file your complaints by mailing them to: Mrbtabusiness@gmail.com.
